sqlMap.select: select name from org where org_id = '1'
sqlMap.update:
update ORG
ORG_TYPE_CODE=#orgTypeCode# NAME=#name# ORG_CODE=#orgCode# ORG_USERNAME=#orgUsername# ORG_PWD=#orgPwd# CERT_TYPE_CODE=#certTypeCode# CERT_NUMBER=#certNumber# AUDIT_FLOW_ID=#auditFlowId# SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# STATE=#state# EMAIL=#email# SUB_EMAIL=#subEmail# STATE_TIME=#stateTime# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# DESCRIPTOR=#descriptor# CUSTOMER_ID=#customerId# ACCOUNT_ID=#accountId# FIL_S_FILE_ID=#filSFileId# S_FILE_ID=#sFileId# AREA_ID=#areaId# ADDRESS=#address# TELEPHONE=#telephone# SUB_TELEPHONE=#subTelephone# PARTNER_TYPE=#partnerType# PWD_UPDATE_DATE=#pwdUpdateDate# ,INDEN_EFF_DATE=#indenEffDate# ,INDEN_EXP_DATE=#indenExpDate# INDEN_ADDRESS=#indenAddress# LEGAL_NAME=#legalName# PARTY_ID=#partyId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
ORG_ID=#orgId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ORG (STATE,STATE_TIME,CREATE_TIME
ORG_ID ORG_TYPE_CODE NAME ORG_CODE ORG_CODE ORG_USERNAME ORG_PWD CERT_TYPE_CODE CERT_NUMBER INDEN_EFF_DATE INDEN_EXP_DATE INDEN_ADDRESS LEGAL_NAME PARTY_ID
SIMPLE_SPELL DESCRIPTOR CUSTOMER_ID ACCOUNT_ID EMAIL SUB_EMAIL AREA_ID ADDRESS TELEPHONE SUB_TELEPHONE FIL_S_FILE_ID S_FILE_ID PARTNER_TYPE tenant_id
) values ( #state# 'D' ,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
#orgId# #orgTypeCode# #name# #orgCode# #orgId# #orgUsername# #orgPwd# #certTypeCode# #certNumber#
#indenEffDate# #indenExpDate# #indenAddress# #legalName# #partyId# #simpleSpell# #descriptor# #customerId# #accountId# #email# #subEmail# #areaId# #address# #telephone# #subTelephone# #filSFileId# #sFileId# #partnerType# #tenantId#
)
sqlMap.select:
select ORG_ID orgId ,ORG_TYPE_CODE orgTypeCode , NAME name, ORG_CODE orgCode , ORG_USERNAME orgUsername, ORG_PWD orgPwd, CERT_NUMBER certNumber, CERT_TYPE_CODE certTypeCode, SIMPLE_SPELL simpleSpell , STATE state, STATE_TIME stateTime, CREATE_TIME createTime, DESCRIPTOR descriptor, CUSTOMER_ID customerId , ACCOUNT_ID accountId, EMAIL email,AUDIT_FLOW_ID auditFlowId, AREA_ID areaId, ADDRESS ADDRESS, TELEPHONE telephone , FIL_S_FILE_ID filSFileId , S_FILE_ID sFileId ,PARTNERCODE partnerCode,PARTNER_TYPE partnerType,SUB_EMAIL subEmail,SUB_TELEPHONE subTelephone,tenant_id tenantId, INDEN_EFF_DATE indenEffDate,INDEN_EXP_DATE indenExpDate,INDEN_ADDRESS indenAddress,LEGAL_NAME legalName from ORG where 1 = 1 and STATE <> 'X'
ORG_ID=#orgId# ORG_TYPE_CODE=#orgTypeCode# NAME LIKE '%'||#name#||'%' ORG_CODE=#orgCode# ORG_USERNAME=#orgUsername# ORG_PWD=#orgPwd# CERT_NUMBER=#certNumber# CERT_TYPE_CODE=#certTypeCode#
SIMPLE_SPELL=#simpleSpell# STATE=#state# STATE_TIME=#stateTime# CREATE_TIME=#createTime# DESCRIPTOR=#descriptor# CUSTOMER_ID=#customerId# ACCOUNT_ID=#accountId# EMAIL=#email# SUB_EMAIL=#subEmail# AREA_ID=#areaId# TELEPHONE=#telephone# SUB_TELEPHONE=#subTelephone# FIL_S_FILE_ID=#filSFileId# S_FILE_ID=#sFileId# PARTNERCODE=#partnerCode# PARTNER_TYPE=#partnerType# INDEN_EFF_DATE=#indenEffDate# INDEN_EXP_DATE=#indenExpDate# INDEN_ADDRESS=#indenAddress# LEGAL_NAME=#legalName# PARTY_ID=#partyId# tenant_id=#tenantId#

SELECT org_id id, CONCAT(org_username,'(',NAME,')') name FROM org WHERE org_username <> '' and state = 'D' <dynamic> <isNotNull prepend="and" property="tenantId"> tenant_id=#tenantId#</isNotNull> </dynamic> ORDER BY org_username
SELECT zone_name FROM AREA WHERE area_id = #areaId# and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select tab2.area_id provinceid, decode(tab1.area_id, null, tab2.area_id, tab1.area_id) cityid, trim(tab2.zone_name) couname, trim(decode(tab1.zone_name, null, tab2.zone_name, tab1.zone_name)) cityname from (select * from area where up_area_id is not null) tab1, (select * from area where up_area_id is null) tab2 where tab1.up_area_id(+) = tab2.area_id order by tab2.zone_name,cityid

select area_id PROVINCEID, zone_name PROVINCENAME from area where up_area_id is null
tenant_id=#tenantId#
order by area_id

select a.area_id areaId,a.desc_info country from area a where a.up_area_id is null and a.area_id in (select o.area_id from org o where o.partner_type='2' and o.tenant_id=#tenantId#) and a.tenant_id=#tenantId# order by a.area_id
select o.org_id orgId,o.org_username orgUsername,o.area_id areaId from org o where o.area_id=#areaId# and o.partner_type='2' and o.tenant_id=#tenantId#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into ORG (STATE,STATE_TIME,CREATE_TIME
ORG_ID ORG_TYPE_CODE NAME ORG_CODE ORG_USERNAME ORG_PWD CERT_TYPE_CODE CERT_NUMBER
SIMPLE_SPELL DESCRIPTOR CUSTOMER_ID ACCOUNT_ID EMAIL AREA_ID TELEPHONE FIL_S_FILE_ID S_FILE_ID tenant_id
) values ('B' ,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0,SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0
#orgId# #orgTypeCode# #name# #orgId# #orgUsername# #orgPwd# #certTypeCode# #certNumber#
#simpleSpell# #descriptor# #customerId# #accountId# #email# #areaId# #telephone# #filSFileId# #sFileId# #tenantId#
)
sqlMap.select:
SELECT AREA_ID areaId,ZONE_NAME zoneName FROM (select tab2.area_id up_area_id, case when tab1.area_id is null then tab2.area_id else tab1.area_id end area_id, trim(tab2.zone_name) COUNAME, trim(case when tab1.zone_name is null then tab2.zone_name else tab1.zone_name end) zone_name from (select * from area where up_area_id is not null) tab1 RIGHT JOIN (select * from area where up_area_id is null) tab2 on tab1.up_area_id = tab2.area_id order by tab2.zone_name,area_id) area
UP_AREA_ID=#areaId# tenant_id=#tenantId#
ORDER BY ZONE_NAME
SELECT ORG_ID orgId , NAME name FROM ORG WHERE STATE = 'D' and tenant_id=#tenantId#

select * from org where ORG_CODE=#orgCode#
ORG_ID != #orgId#
SELECT tenant_id FROM tenant WHERE CODE = #tenantCode#
SELECT admin_id FROM tenant WHERE tenant_id = #tenantId#;

SELECT tenant_id tenantId, name name, code code, logo logo, country country, province province, language language, zip_code zipCode, contract_num contractNum, currency currency, status status, time_zone timeZone, theme theme, create_dt createDt, start_dt startDt, end_dt endDt FROM tenant
tenant_id=#tenantId# code=#code#
